column3: Beginning third quarter 2021, the Company changed the name of Materials, Supplies and Other expense to Purchased Services and Other, which better describes the composition of this expense amount. This change in naming convention does not impact previously reported results.

All prior period share and per share data has been retroactively adjusted to reflect the stock split effective JuneÂ 28, 2021. Certain prior year data has been reclassified to conform to the current presentation.
